name: Pearl Harbour
overview: Nine Japanese bomber squadrons with fighter escorts (named raider one to raider nine) are flying by varying routes to several possible targets. As the commander of nine U.S. squadrons your mission is to intercept the enemy before they reach their targets. You start out with a total of 90 aircraft whilst the enemy have up to 495. Planes on the ground can be destroyed by bombers; bombed airfields, however, are still usable.
